creator: jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk
text:
The StringFromFile function only returns the first record from the file.
This is because the file is (unintentionally) opened every time the function 
is called.

Patch follows which:
- checks if file is already open
- allows variable name to be omitted
- sets up variables in setParameters(), rather than execute()

Created attachment 5457
Patch to fix StringFromFile
creator: jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk
